metadata:adjust.summary: Sort and format Salesforce metadata XML files
metadata:adjust.description: Recursively processes all *-meta.xml files in the specified directory, sorting XML elements alphabetically with special handling for Salesforce metadata structures like PermissionSets, Profiles, and other metadata types.

target-dir.name: target-dir
target-dir.description: Directory containing Salesforce metadata files to process. Defaults to current directory.

backup.name: backup
backup.description: When specified, the command will create a backup directory before processing files.

path.name: path
path.description: Path to the directory containing metadata files to process
